00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_SWITCH_H
00012 #define TT_SWITCH_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_switch:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     position;                       
00028                 
00029         public:
00030                 enum selectors{                                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00031                         k_position,
00032                 };
00033                 
00034                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00035                 tt_switch(void)                                                                         // Constructor          
00036                 {
00037                         position = 1;
00038                 }
00039 
00040                 ~tt_switch(void)                                                                                // Destructor
00041                 {
00042                         ;
00043                 }
00044 
00045 
00046                 // ATTRIBUTES
00047                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00048                 {
00049                         switch (sel){
00050                                 case k_position:
00051                                         position = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00052                                         break;
00053                         }
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00057                 {
00058                         switch (sel){
00059                                 case k_position:
00060                                         return tt_attribute_value(position);
00061                                 default:
00062                                         return 0.0;
00063                         }
00064                 }
00065                 
00066                 
00067                 // DSP LOOP: 1 OUTPUT
00068                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1)
00069                 {
00070                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00071                         while(temp_vs--){
00072                                 switch(position){
00073                                         case 0:
00074                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00075                                                 break;
00076                                         case 1:
00077                                                 *out1->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00078                                                 break;
00079                                 }
00080                         }
00081                         in->reset(); out1->reset();
00082                 }
00083 
00084                 // DSP LOOP: 2 OUTPUTS
00085                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00086                 {
00087                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00088                         while(temp_vs--){
00089                                 switch(position){
00090                                         case 0:
00091                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00092                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00093                                                 break;
00094                                         case 1:
00095                                                 *out1->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00096                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00097                                                 break;
00098                                         case 2:
00099                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00100                                                 *out2->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00101                                                 break;
00102                                 }
00103                         }
00104                         in->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00105                 }
00106                 
00107                 // DSP LOOP: 3 OUTPUTS
00108                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2, tt_audio_signal *out3)
00109                 {
00110                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00111                         while(temp_vs--){
00112                                 switch(position){
00113                                         case 0:
00114                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00115                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00116                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00117                                                 break;
00118                                         case 1:
00119                                                 *out1->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00120                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00121                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00122                                                 break;
00123                                         case 2:
00124                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00125                                                 *out2->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00126                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00127                                                 break;
00128                                         case 3:
00129                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00130                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00131                                                 *out3->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00132                                 }
00133                         }
00134                         in->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset(); out3->reset();
00135                 }

00137                 // DSP LOOP: 4 OUTPUTS
00138                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2, tt_audio_signal *out3, tt_audio_signal *out4)
00139                 {
00140                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00141                         while(temp_vs--){
00142                                 switch(position){
00143                                         case 0:
00144                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00145                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00146                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00147                                                 *out4->vector++ = 0.0;
00148                                                 break;
00149                                         case 1:
00150                                                 *out1->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00151                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00152                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00153                                                 *out4->vector++ = 0.0;
00154                                                 break;
00155                                         case 2:
00156                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00157                                                 *out2->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00158                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00159                                                 *out4->vector++ = 0.0;
00160                                                 break;
00161                                         case 3:
00162                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00163                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00164                                                 *out3->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00165                                                 *out4->vector++ = 0.0;
00166                                         case 4:
00167                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00168                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00169                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00170                                                 *out4->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00171                                 }
00172                         }
00173                         in->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset(); out3->reset(); out4->reset();
00174                 }

00177                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2, tt_audio_signal *out3, tt_audio_signal *out4, tt_audio_signal *out5)
00178                 {
00179                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00180                         while(temp_vs--){
00181                                 switch(position){

00185                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00186                                                 *out4->vector++ = 0.0;
00187                                                 *out5->vector++ = 0.0;
00188                                                 break;
00189                                         case 1:
00190                                                 *out1->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00191                                                 *out2->vector++ = 0.0;
00192                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00193                                                 *out4->vector++ = 0.0;
00194                                                 *out5->vector++ = 0.0;
00195                                                 break;
00196                                         case 2:
00197                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
00198                                                 *out2->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00199                                                 *out3->vector++ = 0.0;
00200                                                 *out4->vector++ = 0.0;
00201                                                 *out5->vector++ = 0.0;
00202                                                 break;

00208                                                 *out5->vector++ = 0.0;
00209                                         case 4:
00210                                                 *out1->vector++ = 0.0;
